resources.string: %1$s:\nToken not found, please pair with the robot again
%1$s:\nThe task was manually canceled, please do not operate the robot from multiple devices simultaneously!
Detected %1$s charging points, with a total of %2$d. To ensure proper machine reorientation, please remove excess charging points.

%1$s:\nDetected a large position deviation between the charging points marked in automatic route mode (web - marking page) and fixed route mode (navigation route page). Please ensure the charging points are marked at the same position in both modes to ensure proper machine reorientation.
Detected %1$d enter elevator points
Detected %1$d inside elevator points
Detected %1$d leave elevator points
Detected %1$d waiting elevator points
%1$s:\nThe current screen of the robot does not support online tasks. Make sure the robot application is on the main screen
%1$s:\\nThe robot does not support responding to tasks from the mobile end while executing call-back, recharge, or return tasks
%1$s:\nFailed to parse data, please repair the pairing with the robot
%1$s:\nThe device is offline, unable to query points
%1$s:\nThe device is offline, unable to start the task
%1$s:\nThe emergency stop switch of the robot has been pressed, unable to start the task
%1$s:\nThe robot is currently executing a route task, and the switch for repeating route tasks is turned on, so it cannot respond to this task!
%1$s:\nFailed to get the route, please check if there is a route on the robot side and if points have been added to the route
%1$s:\nThe robot is currently performing a lift action and cannot execute the task, please try again later
%1$s:\nFailed to parse data, please check if the data sent from the mobile end is abnormal
%1$s:\nThe last task ended abnormally, unable to respond to this task. Please check the robot and try again
%1$s:\nThe robot\'s lift module is detected as not reset, unable to execute the task
%1$s:\nData loaded successfully, but the map name is invalid. Please set the map name to the corresponding floor number
%1$s:\nDetected that map %2$s is illegal:
%1$s:\nThe robot is in mapping mode and cannot execute tasks. Please try again later
%1$s:\nFailed to get points. Please note that the online task mode uses points cached locally on the robot. Make sure to retrieve points on the robot at least once
Please calibrate points of type [waiting point] and [exit point] at the elevator entrance
Please calibrate a point of type [waiting point] at the elevator entrance
Please calibrate a point of type [boarding point] inside the elevator
Please calibrate a point of type [exit point] at the elevator exit
%1$s:\nIt was detected that the map containing the charging pile was not selected, unable to execute the task. Please go to the robot and select a map with the charging pile before starting the task

%1$s:\nIt was detected that the map containing the production point was not selected, unable to execute the task. Please go to the robot and select a map with the production point before starting the task
%1$s:\nUnable to find valid map data. Please check the robot’s map first.
%1$s:\nCannot find the following points: %2$s, unable to start the task
%1$s:\nRoute not found, unable to execute route task
%1$s:\nThe charging pile is not marked, please mark the points correctly before starting the task
%1$s:\nThe charging pile and production points are not marked, please mark the points correctly before starting the task

%1$s:\nDetected that no charging point was marked in automatic route mode (web - marking page). To ensure proper use of the machine’s automatic reorientation function, please mark the charging point in the same position in automatic route mode as in fixed route mode.
%1$s:\nMissing points on floor %2$s:
Enter elevator point not marked
Inside elevator point not marked
Leave elevator point not marked
%1$s:\nIt was detected that there are no fixed routes connected in the current map. Please check the map
%1$s:\nIt was detected that there are no fixed routes connected in the map [%2$s]. Please check the map
%1$s:\nNo valid points marked. Please mark the points first.
%1$s:\nProduct point not marked. Please correctly mark the points before starting the task.
Waiting elevator point not marked
%1$s:\nThe current task mode does not support elevator control
%1$s:\nParameter error, please check if the data sent from the mobile end meets the specifications
%1$s:\nPlease choose the internal network first.
%1$s:\nPlease choose the internal network and outside network first.
%1$s:\nPlease choose the outside network first.
%1$s:\nThe robot\'s battery is too low to start the task
%1$s\nThe robot is currently charging using the adapter and cannot execute the task
%1$s, The robot is currently undergoing self-checking, please wait...
%1$s:\nThe robot is executing a task, please wait for the robot to be idle before resending the task
%1$s:\nThe robot is preparing to execute another task and cannot respond to this task. Please wait for the robot to be idle and resend the task
Unbound button: %1$s
Automatic Route Navigation Mode
Fixed Route Navigation Mode
%1$s:\nThe robot starts executing the task
%1$s:\nThe robot will start the task soon
